summary: This is Zartha, A Ningheim, Racemenu Preset.
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ffff00]"Zartha":
[/color]
[size=3][color=#ff00ff]A Ningheim, Racemenu Preset.[/color]
[/size]
[size=3]Installation & Required Mods:[/size]

1. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]RaceMenu[/url][url=http://http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/29624/?]

[/url]2. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/35474/?]The Ningheim Race[/url]

3. In the Download section of The Ningheim Race Under "Update" Also   Grab "The Ningheim Race - Scripts Update" & Install it,    Trust me you'll thank me later...LOL Especially if you use an ENB.

4. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/24168/?]Race Compatibility for Skyrim & Dawnguard

[/url]5. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30411/?]Brows

[/url]6. In the Download Section of "Brows" Under "Optional Files" Also Grab    "Ningheim Addon" & Install it!!  if you don't you will Get a    Blue Stripe where the Eye Brows will be... "this is very IMPORTANT!!"

7. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/68311/?]KS Hairdos

[/url]8. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/74491/?]Combined KS Hairdos

[/url]9. [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/60769/?]Stoja's Warpaints -A High Resolution Makeup Kit

[/url]10. Install the Presets... Drop the "Zartha.dds" & "Zartha.nif" files    into Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen Folder.

11. & Drop the "Zartha.jslot" file into Data/SKSE/Plugins/CharGen/Presets Folder.

12. Now go into game & open your console with tilde [~] & type showracemenu   & go to "Sculpt" tab & press F9 To Import the head.


OPTONAL:
to get the exact looks you will need to install:

1st Install---> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/51602/?]Fair Skin Complexion[/url]
Then Install---> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/73512/?]Leyenda Skin[/url]

Body used in screenshots is called "Demon Fet" a modified version of the---> [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/36992/?]SeveNBase [/url]Body
PM me for more details



PLEASE!!! By all means Post your own pictures I would love to see your pics!!!  :)
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

"[color=#ff00ff]Hvergelmir[/color]"                                                      For the Brows.
"[color=#ff00ff]Kalilies[/color]" "[color=#ff00ff]Stealthic Khaos[/color]" & "[color=#ff00ff]Shocky[/color]"              For the HairDos
